attributes.action: recognise the outstanding achievements of Jane Tomlinson in the Honours lists, by way of a Damehood.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is a petition to highlight the fantastic courage and strength of charity cyclist and runner Jane Tomlinson, and the work she did as campaigner and fundraiser to help raise hopes for future cancer sufferers.  (This petiton is a follow-up to an earlier petiion which omitted her name.)

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
